description:
Amazing Breaker is a beautiful addictive ice-smashing game. 
The aim of the game is to blast the ice sculptures with different bombs:
◆ Spike Bomb – simply aim and shoot
◆ Ghost Bomb – goes through ice, press and hold to control it
◆ Helicopter Bomb – press to deploy violet crystals
◆ Split Bomb – press to split into 3 green explosive crystals
◆ AND OTHER BOMBS TO DEVELOP YOUR WINNING STRATEGY!

• Explosive Excitement - create cascades of exploding crystals
• Procedural destructions
• 320 awesome levels
• Addictive “Aim and Shoot” gameplay
• Easy to learn but hard to master
name: Amazing Breaker
